page.title: 10WILDEN LADIES CLUB.
page.content: The Club has at present 48 members. It was formed in 1967 by the then Headmistress, Miss Stillwell. The Club meets on the 2nd Tuesday each month, except January and August. Each year the members elect a Charity and throughout the year, the money from Coffee mornings, Ploughman's lunches,barn dances, and the Christmas entertainment, is collected and handed to the Charity selected. This year, the Leukemia Research will benefit. Over the last 10 years the club has donated Â£1350 to charity.Various speakers are invited to the club, spanning the duties of a butler, cookery, palmistry, travel, beauty, fashion, flower arranging etc. 20 members of the club are writing,producing and performing their own version of Robin Hood for the Christmas entertainment this year.
